creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: standing figure wearing a flowered kimono, facing camera, with face partially in shadow, with an ominous expression; figure has PR arm stretched upward with hand in "thumb's-up" gesture, and PL hand on top of head; silhouettes of blooming grasses against white sky
signed: on back, in pencil: Kamaitahi #34, 1968 / (artist\'s signature in Japanese) / Eikoh Hosoe
title: Kamaitachi #34
